title: of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2024 (Section 15) (Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (section 15) (commencement) order 2025

title: of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024)
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 15
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 15 
of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024) 
comes into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 March, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [63] 3

title: of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 24 of 2024)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 amended the Social 
Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 to provide for a new Jobseeker’s Pay-Related 
Benefit scheme. 

Section 15 of the Social Welfare (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 amends 
Section 126 of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 to confirm that Jobseeker’s 
Pay-Related Benefit is taxable under Schedule E, and deems the payments of 
this benefit to be payments to which the PAYE system applies. This ensures 
similar tax treatment to that of Jobseeker’s Benefit. 

(Part 3) 
The Social Welfare 
(Commencement) Order 2024 provides that the Jobseeker’s Pay-Related Benefit 
scheme shall commence from 31 March 2025. 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 

This Order provides for the commencement of Section 15 of the Social Welfare 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 from 31 March 2025 to coincide with the 
commencement of Jobseeker’s Pay-Related Benefit scheme. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [63]
